# Interface LLMMessageInterface

Represents a message in a chat system.

interface LLMMessageInterface {  
content: string | [ContentItemInterface](./common_vector_messages.ContentItemInterface)[];  
role: string;  
toolCallId?: string;  
toolCalls?: [ToolCallInterface](./common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)[];  
}

##### Index

### Properties

content role toolCallId? toolCalls?

## Properties

### content

content: string | [ContentItemInterface](./common_vector_messages.ContentItemInterface)[]

The content of the message - either text or multimodal content items

### role

role: string

The role of the message: user, assistant, system, tool, etc.

### `Optional`toolCallId

toolCallId?: string

Tool call that this message is responding to. Only used for the 'tool' role.

### `Optional`toolCalls

toolCalls?: [ToolCallInterface](./common_vector_messages.ToolCallInterface)[]

The tool calls generated by the model, such as function calls.

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
